title: Halloween Pumpkins
subtle: Concept (fiction), 31 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR40L
description: Halloween Pumpkins is a delightful story about the different ways you can carve a pumpkin for Halloween. Detailed illustrations and repetitive text support early emergent readers. Students will have the opportunity to identify the author's purpose as well as connect to prior knowledge to better understand the story.
